param.name: symbol
param.label: Symbol for the filter. Applied data symbol value.
param.option: Equals. Keep only rows where column equals this value.
Not qquals. Keep only rows where column not equal to this value.
Less than. Keep only rows where column less than this value.
Less than equals. Keep only rows where column less than or equal to this value.
Greater than. Keep only rows where column greater than this value.
Greater than equals. Keep only rows where column greater than or equal to this value.
In. Keep only rows where column %in% list.
Not In. Remove rows where column %in% list.
